Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Head and Neck Disorder/Neck Disorder/Parathyroid Gland Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Parathyroid Gland Disorder/Hyperparathyroidism/Primary Hyperparathyroidism
Record.Description: A condition of abnormally elevated output of PARATHYROID HORMONE due to parathyroid HYPERPLASIA or PARATHYROID NEOPLASMS. It is characterized by the combination of HYPERCALCEMIA, phosphaturia, elevated renal 1,25-DIHYDROXYVITAMIN D3 synthesis, and increased BONE RESORPTION.
